query:
-- 1.3.1 Add vatNumber column to clients table (VARCHAR 50, nullable)
-- 1.3.2 Add taxExempt column to clients table (BOOLEAN, default false)
ALTER TABLE `clients`
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `vatNumber` VARCHAR(50) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `taxExempt` BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE;
